text.div:
PerineuralInvasion

This is the code has the options of Not identified, present and present and extensive.

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    385001000Perineural invasion by tumour not identified
    369731000Perineural invasion by tumour present
  • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.hl7.org.au/fhir/rcpa/CodeSystem/perineural-invasion
